POST
/task/text/translation
Translate


Translates text using selected LLM model and records telemetry.

Parameters
Cancel
Reset
Name	Description
x-application-name
string | (string | null)
(header)
x-application-name
Request body

application/json
Edit Value
Schema
{
  "inputs": {
    "text": "string",
    "target_language": "vietnamese"
  },
  "parameters": {
    "model_name": "gpt4o"
  }
}
Execute
Clear
Responses
Curl
